BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

Items.AgendaNote: Jointly with the Committee on Health and the Committee on State & Federal Legislation

Items.Title: Resolution opposing the Governor's Budget proposal to close the Institute for Basic Research in Staten Island that serves children and adults with serious and persistent mental disabilities in the City and State of New York, and calling for the immediate restoration to the budget of all funds necessary to keep the Institutes' valuable research programs and treatment programs operating.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Opposing the Governor's Budget proposal to close the Institute for Basic Research in Staten Island.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon Governor George Pataki to withdraw a Fiscal Year 2003-2004 budget proposal to cut Medicaid funds received by cities and counties, and further calling upon the New York State Legislature to reject all Fiscal Year 2003-2004 budget proposals that limit Medicaid funds received by cities and counties.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Governor Pataki to withdraw a FY'03-'04 budget proposal to cut Medicaid funds.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon Governor George Pataki to withdraw a Fiscal Year 2003-2004 budget proposal to amend Article VI of the Public Health Law to limit state matching funds received by cities and counties for eligible public health activities; and further calling upon the New York State Legislature to reject all Fiscal Year 2003-2004 budget proposals which limit state matching funds received by cities and counties for eligible public health activities.
Items.MatterName: Governor to withdraw a FY 2003-2004 budget proposal to amend Article VI of the Public Health Law.
